thing-type.label: Update Receiver
thing-type.description: An endpoint thing that can receive and propagate HTTP GET updates meant for a particular station id at wunderground.com

parameter.name: stationId
parameter.label: Station ID
parameter.description:
The wunderground.com update api requires a station id, that is defined for the WeatherUnderground account measurements are to be submitted to.

In this binding it is used to identify a unique thing, so each device or other apparatus submitting measurements can have a separate id, but if you don't intend to forward the observations to wunderground.com, this value can be any non-blank string.
